title: Jane Digby's Diary: To Begin, Begin
description: Bright, beautiful, and bold, Jane Digby led a remarkable life. Born to privilege in 1807 at Dorset, England, she soon scandalized Europe with her reckless pursuit of of freedom. She sacrificed home, family, and respectability for her passions. Kings, princes, barons, brigands, lords, and sheiks were among her lovers. A gifted artist and musician, as well as a superb horsewoman, she spoke several languages, read widely, wrote eloquently, and embraced all manner of culture and travel.  An amusing, thoughtful, and moving work of historical fiction, JANE DIGBY'S DIARY offers a compelling account of the life of a woman who truly lived all for love. Join her on her path to a life well lived.  This volume, TO BEGIN, BEGIN, is the first installment of the serial, JANE DIGBY'S DIARY. Volume Two, A REBEL HEART, is now available in the Kindle store.
author: C.R. Hurst
